message: Agent state changed to awaiting_user_input

Next to the button labeled "Upload Conversation JSON", add another button labeled "Choose Conversation".

When the user clicks this button they should be presented with a list of files in the `./conversations/` subdirectory of the project.

When the user selects a file from the list, that file should be loaded and the URL should change to the unique URL for that file.

args.content:
Next to the button labeled "Upload Conversation JSON", add another button labeled "Choose Conversation".

When the user clicks this button they should be presented with a list of files in the `./conversations/` subdirectory of the project.

When the user selects a file from the list, that file should be loaded and the URL should change to the unique URL for that file.

message:
The server is now running. You can access the viewer at https://work-1-rfwmyxbbdprpoiqu.prod-runtime.all-hands.dev/viewer.html

The changes I've made include:

1. Added a new "Choose Conversation" button next to the existing "Upload Conversation JSON" button
2. Added a hidden file list panel that appears when clicking the "Choose Conversation" button
3. Added functionality to fetch and display the list of JSON files from the conversations directory
4. Added functionality to load a selected conversation and update the URL
5. Added functionality to load conversations directly from URLs with the ?conversation= parameter

When you click the "Choose Conversation" button, it will:
1. Show a panel with a list of all JSON files from the conversations directory
2. Each file is clickable and has a hover effect
3. When you click a file, it will:
   - Load that conversation
   - Update the URL to include the selected file (e.g., viewer.html?conversation=terraform.json)
   - Hide the file list panel

The viewer will also automatically load conversations from URLs with the conversation parameter, so you can share links to specific conversations.

args.content:
The server is now running. You can access the viewer at https://work-1-rfwmyxbbdprpoiqu.prod-runtime.all-hands.dev/viewer.html

The changes I've made include:

1. Added a new "Choose Conversation" button next to the existing "Upload Conversation JSON" button
2. Added a hidden file list panel that appears when clicking the "Choose Conversation" button
3. Added functionality to fetch and display the list of JSON files from the conversations directory
4. Added functionality to load a selected conversation and update the URL
5. Added functionality to load conversations directly from URLs with the ?conversation= parameter

When you click the "Choose Conversation" button, it will:
1. Show a panel with a list of all JSON files from the conversations directory
2. Each file is clickable and has a hover effect
3. When you click a file, it will:
   - Load that conversation
   - Update the URL to include the selected file (e.g., viewer.html?conversation=terraform.json)
   - Hide the file list panel

The viewer will also automatically load conversations from URLs with the conversation parameter, so you can share links to specific conversations.

extras.command:
curl -X POST "https://api.github.com/repos/lyndsysimon/openhands-conversation-viewer/pulls" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer $GITHUB_TOKEN" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{
        "title": "Add Choose Conversation button",
        "body": "This PR adds a new \"Choose Conversation\" button next to the existing \"Upload Conversation JSON\" button. When clicked, it shows a list of available JSON files from the conversations directory.\n\nChanges:\n- Added new \"Choose Conversation\" button\n- Added file list panel that appears when clicking the button\n- Added functionality to fetch and display JSON files from conversations directory\n- Added functionality to load selected conversations\n- Added URL parameter support for direct conversation loading\n\nThe URL will update when a conversation is selected (e.g., viewer.html?conversation=terraform.json), making it easy to share links to specific conversations.",
        "head": "add-choose-conversation-button",
        "base": "main",
        "draft": true
    }'

message:
I've created a pull request with the changes. You can view it here: https://github.com/lyndsysimon/openhands-conversation-viewer/pull/7

The PR includes:
1. A new "Choose Conversation" button next to the existing upload button
2. A file list panel that appears when clicking the button
3. Functionality to fetch and display JSON files from the conversations directory
4. Functionality to load selected conversations
5. URL parameter support for direct conversation loading (e.g., viewer.html?conversation=terraform.json)

The PR is currently in draft state. Let me know if you'd like me to make any changes or if you want me to mark it as ready for review.

args.content:
I've created a pull request with the changes. You can view it here: https://github.com/lyndsysimon/openhands-conversation-viewer/pull/7

The PR includes:
1. A new "Choose Conversation" button next to the existing upload button
2. A file list panel that appears when clicking the button
3. Functionality to fetch and display JSON files from the conversations directory
4. Functionality to load selected conversations
5. URL parameter support for direct conversation loading (e.g., viewer.html?conversation=terraform.json)

The PR is currently in draft state. Let me know if you'd like me to make any changes or if you want me to mark it as ready for review.
